comments.body:
Something that came up recently was whether we need to cap the max request size too. I.e. in addition to this, have a byte limit.

Shouldn't block this PR as it can be added later, just wanted to mention it here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@	// Default configuration values for ModeBatch.
	defaultBatchBufferSize = 10000            // Buffer up to 10000 events before starting discarding.
	defaultBatchMaxSize    = 400              // Only send up to 400 events at a time.
	defaultBatchMaxWait    = 30 * time.Second // Send events at least twice a minute.
